title.native: この世界は不完全すぎる

description:
Despite its location in a remote region south of the continent of Felnarc, the island of Clayborne is made up of five small countries crowded together and in constant conflict. In the most remote reaches of the smallest and most peaceful country on the island, the Kingdom of Bayle, is the small village where a girl named Nikola lives a humble life. One day, while she's out gathering firewood as she does every day, a massive dragon—a creature that's supposed to only live deep in the mountains—appears in front of her. Just as it's about to attack the village, a man named Haga rushes to the scene. Haga is a member of the King's Seekers, a top secret investigation team. Nikola has never once felt bored with her peaceful life, even when every single day is practically the same, but after meeting Haga, she's so intrigued by Haga and his travels that she decides to step out into the world herself... and then the learns the true nature of her world.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Time Loop
tags.description: A character is stuck in a repetitive cycle that they are attempting to break out of. This is distinct from a manipulating time of their own choice.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Software Development
tags.description: Centers around characters developing or programming a piece of technology, software, gaming, etc.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.

__[Website](http://shogo.strikes.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shogoy)__

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.
Twitter | Website (artist page) __Seima Iwahashi__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, director and orechestrator. He is a member of the music production team, Elements Garden.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/brunosangregorio/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/clayton.sangregorio)

Bruno Sangregório is an actor, dubbing artist, producer, dubbing coordinator and dubbing director, and also a teacher at the DuBrasil Dubbing Course for Actors. He is married to the voice actress [Luana Stteger](https://anilist.co/staff/197329/).

He also acts as a filmmaker, being a director and screenwriter for the company Intra7 Filmes. He is a founding member and collective director of the theatrical group Mídias Conexas.
Tyler Walker is an ADR Director, Script writer and voice actor for FUNimation.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/manuelaoriguella/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/manuoriguella) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/manuela.o.ventura) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@manuelaoriguella4630) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@manuoriguella)

Manuela Origuella Ventura is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, singer, comedian, and content creator.
